resources.string: PulseLink needs access to your location to show people nearby and display coverage maps.
Location access is required to find nearby users and show coverage areas.\n\nPlease enable it in Settings > PulseLink > Location
Location permission denied. You can grant it later in settings.

Without location access, you won't be able to:

• See people nearby
• View coverage maps
• Get location-based recommendations

You can enable location access in Settings > PulseLink > Location
